title: [Marble Springs, Channels]
description: Flowing with silver-flecked stream water, a series of marble channels follows the cobblestone path.  The shallow channels, built to hold no more than a few inches of water each, crisscross one another and rise and fall as the rushing water ascends and descends a pattern of carefully constructed, miniature steps.  The quiet gurgling of the silvery fluid seems harmonious with the natural sounds made by local birds and the rustling of nearby trees.

Flowing with moonlit stream water, a series of marble channels follows the cobblestone path.  The shallow channels, built to hold no more than a few inches of water each, crisscross one another and rise and fall as the rushing water ascends and descends a pattern of carefully constructed, miniature steps.  The quiet gurgling of the silvery fluid seems harmonious with the natural sounds made by crickets and the rustling of nearby trees.
